This creates jobs & """"destruction"""" of land to build this, is like everything else- temporary. The Native American representatives agreed to this. There was a vote. The majority felt this was a good thing. There are always hardliners, though. """"No one on my land. My land is sacred."""" I was born in the mountains, live in the South, & that's the general consensus around here, too... but when lots of jobs are on the line, more money in our pockets, money to help locals, that changes things.

It s called occupation , occupation is not only occupation of the land but it is worth it's to be under military rules and laws in your daily life. Now these Israeli soldiers are Hero, they bring to light a collective low moral of the Israeli society that is silent knowing what's really going on in the Judea and Samaria area and East Jerusalem, It is not necessarily an option to have 2 states .but what is necessary is that all people living on the same ground is being ruled by an unique civil entity.a country can be federated it s help to solve the demographic conflict by keeping the unity of the civil laws. If *Shovrim Shtika* went to look outside Israel it is because inside Israel corruption within the bureaucracy and legal system is High, just look what happened within the police and as well cases within the army and all level in all different mimistries.
